name: Shortcuts-ick
title: Shortcuts for 1.0
author: npc_strider(morley376), modified by ickputzdirwech
description:
Now supports Spidertron remote. 

Adds a host of useful shortcuts to improve QOL. Shortcuts for the artillery remote, discharge defense remote, tree deconstructor, and toggles for equipment, rail blocks and the player lamp. Additionally adds in a customizable grid overlay, far zoom and a artillery wagon toggle. Suggest any new shortcut ideas to the discussion page. Original mod by npc_strider(morley376) mods.factorio.com/mod/Shortcuts.
